info.title: Swaps API
info.description:
The Swaps API provides instant cross-chain swap and bridge functionality for decentralized applications.
It supports multiple virtual machines (EVM, Solana, Bitcoin) and various DEX protocols and bridge solutions.

get.description: Generates a transaction for cross-chain swaps, bridges, and calls. The action includes transaction data, routing information, and fee calculations for executing the requested operation.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description:
The exact in or exact out amount of the swap


`swap-action`

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description:
Address to receive the swapped tokens

`swap-action`

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
The EVM address of the target contract (20 bytes hex)

`evm-calldata-tx`

parameters.name: erc20Amount
parameters.description:
The amount of Erc20 being transferred

**Optional:** Use for calls requiring Erc20 transfers

`evm-calldata-tx`

parameters.name: erc20Spender
parameters.description:
The Erc20 spender requiring approval for the transaction call

**Optional:** Will default to the `to` address

`evm-calldata-tx`

parameters.name: bridgeIds
parameters.description:
Specific bridge protocols to use

**Optional:** Will default to all available protocols

parameters.name: refundTo
parameters.description:
Alternate address to receive refunds

**Optional:** Will default to the `sender`

parameters.name: returnDepositAddress
parameters.description:
Return a deposit address for deposit-based flows

**Optional:** Set to `true` to receive a deposit address in the response

parameters.name: appFees
parameters.description:
Application fees configuration as JSON array

**Optional:** Will default to fees configured for the application

 **Example:** `[{ "bps": 50, "receiverAddress": "0x..." }]`
